original: 京兆杜陵人，曹魏官員。當代著名書法家，尤擅長草書、題署牌匾。此外亦精於製墨，與張芝筆、左伯紙並稱三絕。
text: Jingzhao Duling, Cao Wei official. A famous contemporary calligrapher, especially good at cursive script and inscribed plaque. In addition, he is also proficient in ink making, and he is called the three masters with Zhang Zhi pen and Zuo Bo paper.
